content:
Dear remote participants and speakers,

Please use the following Zoom links to attend:

  • Day 1 (December 9)
  • Day 2 (December 10)
  • Day 3 (December 11)
  • Day 4 (December 12)

We look forward to your participation.
Hi everyone, I hope everything went fine with the Zoom livestream. In any case, we will polish and upload the recordings on YouTube in a week or so.
